rules_text: [i]Finale[/i] – Whenever an enchantment is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, create a token a The One Who Watches the End. [i](It's a Legendary {3} 2/2 with Vigilance and “When this creature dies, you may exile it. If you do, you may search your library for a card named The One Who Watches The End, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.”)[/i]
